flawed_nl_solution:
Three weeks ago, there were 40 - 10 = <<40-10=40>>40 campers.
The total number of campers from three to two weeks ago is 40 + 40 = <<40+40=80>>80.
Hence, there were 150 - 80 = <<150-80=70>>70 campers last week.

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 30, not 40. It appears there was a miscalculation with the digits before the final zero.
